review: We have had this for a week and so far it was very easy to set up and install. We did use the included extender to make it easier to install into our TV's. The only draw back was trying to get the new remotes open to get the included batteries in. This took a few minutes. We also have an older (5-6 year old) flat screen as our main TV and it took a few tries to get every thing working correctly. On newer HD TV's the fire stick just plugs in, and literately walk you through the steps to start up. We also figured out that there really was no "off" switch and after a set amount of time you get a nice screen saver and the device shuts itself off. The remote is easy to use and menu easy to navigate. It may take a few time of trial and error but was definitely worth the purchase and wait. We don't have satellite or cable so this was a good alternative to watch netflix, huluplus, and amazon prime.
